00019 const RECORD_SEPARATOR_LEN = 2;
00020 static char *RECORD_SEPARATOR = "\r\n";
00021 const FIELD_SEPARATOR_LEN = 1;
00022 static char *FIELD_SEPARATOR = "\t";
00023 
00024 static char *export_num(int value) {
00025     static char num_str[20];
00026     return itoa( value, num_str, 10 );              // 10 is radix
00027 }
00028 
00029 static char *export_num(double value) {
00030     static char num_str[20];
00031     return gcvt( value, 7, num_str );               // a few more more than 7, for negative sign, decimal point and exponent
00032 }
00033 
00034 static char *export_percent(double value) {       // value already multiplied by 100
00035     static char num_str[20];
00036     //return gcvt( value*0.01, 7, num_str ); // a few more more than 7, for negative sign, decimal point and exponent
00037     gcvt( value, 7, num_str );                      // a few more more than 7, for negative sign, decimal point and exponent
00038     strcat( num_str, "%" );
00039     return num_str;
00040 }
00041 
00042 #define WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(f)      f->file_write(FIELD_SEPARATOR, FIELD_SEPARATOR_LEN)
00043 #define WRITE_STR_FIELD(f,s)          { f->file_write(s, strlen(s)); }
00044 #define WRITE_NUM_FIELD(f,n)          { char *s=export_num(n); f->file_write(s, strlen(s)); }
00045 #define WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(f,n)      { char *s=export_percent(n); f->file_write(s, strlen(s)); }
00046 #define WRITE_RECORD_SEPARATOR(f)     f->file_write(RECORD_SEPARATOR, RECORD_SEPARATOR_LEN)

00050 int GameFile::create_game_log(char *fileName) {
00051     File file;
00052 
00053     file.file_create(fileName);
00054     if( !write_log_header(&file) ) {
00055         file.file_close();
00056         return 0;
00057     }
00058 
00059     file.file_close();
00060     return 1;
00061 }
00062 
00063 int GameFile::append_game_log(char *fileName) {
00064     File file;
00065 
00066     file.file_append(fileName);
00067     file.file_seek(0, FILE_END);
00068 
00069     if( !write_log(&file) ) {
00070         file.file_close();
00071         return 0;
00072     }
00073 
00074     file.file_close();
00075     return 1;
00076 }
00077 
00078 int GameFile::write_log_header(File* filePtr) {
00079     // write date field
00080 
00081     WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "year" );
00082 
00083     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00084 
00085     WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "year/month" );
00086 
00087     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00088 
00089     if( !player_school.write_log_header(filePtr) )
00090         return 0;
00091 
00092     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00093 
00094     if( !department_array.write_log_header(filePtr) )
00095         return 0;
00096 
00097     WRITE_RECORD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00098 
00099     return 1;
00100 }
00101 
00102 int GameFile::write_log(File* filePtr) {
00103     // write date field
00104     // use the different between info.game_date and info.game_start_date
00105 
00106     int startYear = date.year(info.game_start_date);
00107     int startMonth = date.month(info.game_start_date);
00108     int curYear = info.game_year;
00109     int curMonth = info.game_month;
00110     // add 1 prerun year
00111     int monthDiff = (curYear-startYear+1) * 12 + curMonth - startMonth;
00112     WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, (float)monthDiff/12.0f );
00113 
00114     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00115 
00116     WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, info.date_str_ymd(curYear, curMonth, 1, INFO_DATE_DEFAULT|INFO_DATE_NO_DAY|INFO_DATE_SHORT_MONTH ) );
00117 
00118     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00119 
00120     if( !player_school.write_log(filePtr) )
00121         return 0;
00122 
00123     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00124 
00125     if( !department_array.write_log(filePtr) )
00126         return 0;
00127 
00128     WRITE_RECORD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00129 
00130     return 1;
00131 }

00133 int PlayerSchool::write_log_header(File *filePtr) {
00134     WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "GameScore");          // cummulative game score
00135     // Current trustee evaluation
00136     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "TrusteeEval");
00137 
00138     // sub_score array
00139     static char *scoreFieldName[SCORE_VAR_COUNT] = {
00140         "Degrees", "Research$",
00141         "Prestige", "EdQuality", "Scholarship", "StuDivers", "FacDivers", "AlumGift%",
00142         "FacMorale", "StuMorale", "StaffMorale",
00143         "Surplus", "SmSurplus", "EndPoRate", "DefMaint",
00144     };
00145 
00146     for( int scoreType = 0; scoreType < SCORE_VAR_COUNT; ++scoreType ) {
00147         WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, scoreFieldName[scoreType]);
00148     }
00149 
00150     // Alumni morale
00151     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "AlumMorale");
00152     // Index of endowment market value
00153     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "EndMV");
00154     // Crime Index
00155     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "Crime");
00156     // Space shortfall
00157     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "SpaceShort");
00158     // Football performance
00159     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "Football%");
00160     // Basketball performance
00161     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "BBall%");
00162 
00163     // UG applications
00164     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgApps");
00165     // UG Yield
00166     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgYield");
00167     // UG academic talent
00168     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgAcadTal");
00169     // UG extra curricular talent
00170     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgXcurTal");
00171     // UG athletic talent
00172     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgAthTal");
00173     // UG academic performance
00174     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgAcadPerf");
00175     // UG academic satisfaction
00176     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgAcadSat");
00177     // UG student life satisfaction
00178     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgStLifeSat");
00179     // UG athletics satisfaction
00180     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "UgAthdSat");
00181     // DL demand
00182     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "DL_Demand");
00183     // DL provided
00184     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "DL_Provide");
00185     // Quality of IT infra. & training
00186     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "IT-infra");
00187     // Percent of courses opt.d for IT
00188     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "IT_course%");
00189 
00190     return 1;
00191 }

00193 int PlayerSchool::write_log(File *filePtr) {
00194     WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, ultimate_game_score);  // "GameScore" cummulative game score
00195     // "TrusteeEval" Current trustee evaluation
00196     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, cur_game_score);
00197 
00198     // sub_score array
00199 
00200     for( int scoreType = 0; scoreType < SCORE_VAR_COUNT; ++scoreType ) {
00201         WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, sub_score[scoreType][HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1]);
00202     }
00203 
00204     // "AlumMorale" Alumni morale
00205     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, development_office.alumni_morale);
00206     // "EndMV" Index of endowment market value
00207     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, investment_office.endowment_performance_history[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1]);
00208     // "Crime" Crime Index
00209     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, facility_office.crime_index[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1]);
00210     // "SpaceShort" Space shortfall
00211     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, facility_office.normal_area[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] - facility_office.projected_area[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00212     // "Football%" Football performance
00213     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, athletics_office.football_percent_win * 100.0);
00214     // "BBall%" Basketball performance
00215     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, athletics_office.basketball_percent_win * 100.0 );
00216 
00217     // "UgApps" UG applications
00218     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, enroll_res.total_applications[UG_TRADITION]+enroll_res.total_applications[UG_NONTRADITION] );
00219     float ugYield;
00220     if( enroll_res.total_offers[UG_TRADITION]+enroll_res.total_offers[UG_NONTRADITION] < 1 )
00221         ugYield = 0.0f;
00222     else
00223         ugYield = float(enroll_res.total_matrics[UG_TRADITION]+enroll_res.total_matrics[UG_NONTRADITION])
00224             / float(enroll_res.total_offers[UG_TRADITION]+enroll_res.total_offers[UG_NONTRADITION]) * 100.0f;
00225     // "UgYield" UG Yield
00226     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, ugYield );
00227     // "UgAcadTal" UG academic talent
00228     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, talent_academic[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00229     // "UgXcurTal" UG extra curricular talent
00230     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, talent_extracurricular[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00231     // "UgAthTal" UG athletic talent
00232     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, talent_athletics[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00233     // "UgAcadPerf" UG academic performance
00234     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, performance_academic_ug[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00235     // "UgAcadSat" UG academic satisfaction
00236     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, satisfaction_academic[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00237     // "UgStLifeSat" UG student life satisfaction
00238     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, satisfaction_student_life[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00239     // "UgAthdSat" UG athletics satisfaction
00240     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, satisfaction_athletics[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00241 
00242     //  WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, enroll_res.total_matrics[DISTANCE_LEARN] ); // "DL_Demand" DL Demand
00243     // "DL_Demand" DL Demand
00244     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, enroll_res.matric_history[DISTANCE_LEARN][ER_CREDITS_DEMANDED][THIS_YEAR] );
00245 
00246     // sum of distance_credits_provided of every department
00247     //int sumCreditProvided = 0;
00248     //for( int deptRecno = 1; deptRecno <= department_array.size(); ++deptRecno )
00249     //{
00250     //  if( department_array.is_deleted(deptRecno) )
00251     //          continue;
00252     //  sumCreditProvided += department_array[deptRecno]->distance_credits_provided;
00253     //}
00254     //WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, sumCreditProvided ); // "DL_Provide" DL provided
00255     // "DL_Provide" DL provided
00256     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, enroll_res.distance_credits_provided_history[THIS_TRIMESTER] );
00257 
00258     // "IT-infra" Quality of IT infra. & training
00259     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, library_tech_office.internet_quality );
00260     // "IT_course%" Percent of courses opt.d for IT
00261     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, library_tech_office.tech_utilization );
00262 
00263     return 1;
00264 }

00266 int DepartmentArray::write_log_header(File *filePtr) {
00267 
00268     WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "ResPerf");            // Faculty research performance
00269     // Faculty salaries:annual incr.(%)
00270     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "FacSals%");
00271     // Faculty salaries:gender-ethnic equity
00272     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "FacSals:GE");
00273     // Faculty salaries:departmental equity
00274     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "FacSals:D");
00275     // Faculty salaries:rank equity
00276     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "FacSals:R");
00277     // Tuition:annual increase
00278     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "Tuition%");
00279     // Course denials (% of enrollments)
00280     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "CseDenials");
00281 
00282     // department may not be created
00283     for( int departRecno = 1; departRecno <= MAX_DEPARTMENT; ++departRecno ) {
00284         WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00285 
00286         if( !Department::write_log_header(filePtr) )
00287             return 0;
00288     }
00289 
00290     return 1;
00291 }
00292 
00293 int DepartmentArray::write_log(File *filePtr) {
00294     // "ResPerf" Faculty research performance
00295     WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, p_faculty_research_history[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1]);
00296     // "FacSals%" Faculty saleries:annual incr.(%)
00297     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, finance.expense_policy_array[PL_FACULTY_SALARY_INCREASES].result_value);
00298     // "FacSals:GE" Faculty salaries:gender-ethnic equity
00299     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, salary_gender_ethnic_equity_history[THIS_YEAR]);
00300     // "FacSals:D" Faculty salaries:departmental equity
00301     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, salary_departmental_equity_history[THIS_YEAR]);
00302     // "FacSals:R" Faculty salaries:rank equity
00303     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, salary_rank_equity_history[THIS_YEAR]);
00304     // "Tuition%" Tuition:annual increase
00305     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, finance.revenue_policy_array[PL_TUITION_RATE_GROWTH].result_value);
00306     // "CseDenials" Course denials (% of enrollments)
00307     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, 100.0*math.safe_divide(admission_denied_count[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD],convention_student_count[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD]));
00308 
00309     for( int departRecno = 1; departRecno <= size(); ++departRecno ) {
00310         if( is_deleted(departRecno) )
00311             continue;
00312 
00313         WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr);
00314 
00315         if( !operator[](departRecno)->write_log(filePtr) )
00316             return 0;
00317     }
00318 
00319     return 1;
00320 }

00322 int Department::write_log_header(File *filePtr) {

00328     // Faculty research talent
00329     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_FacResTal" );
00330     // Faculty teaching performance
00331     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_FacTchPerf" );
00332     // Faculty scholarship performance
00333     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_FacSchPerf" );
00334     // Faculty research performance
00335     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_FacResPerf" );
00336     // Faculty morale
00337     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_FacMorale" );
00338     // Pct faculty with spons. research
00339     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_SponsRes%" );
00340 
00341     // Class size deviation from norm

00343     // Students denied entrance to cses
00344     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_CseDenials" );
00345     // Percent failures
00346     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_Failures%" );
00347     // Percent of courses opt. for IT
00348     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_IT_course%" );
00349     // Outsourced credits
00350     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_Outsource_Cr" );
00351     // Distance learning credits
00352     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, "D_DL_Credits" );
00353 
00354     return 1;

00356 
00357 int Department::write_log(File *filePtr) {
00358     //                                  WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, department_id ); // "DeptID" department Id
00359     WRITE_STR_FIELD(filePtr, name() );              // "DeptID" department Id
00360     // "D_FacTchTal" Faculty teaching talent
00361     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, faculty_array.talent_teaching[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT-1] );
00362     // "D_FacSchTal" Faculty scholarship talent
00363     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, faculty_array.talent_scholarship[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT-1] );
00364     // "D_FacResTal" Faculty research talent
00365     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, faculty_array.talent_research[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT-1] );
00366     // "D_FacTchPerf" Faculty teaching performance
00367     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, faculty_array.performance_teaching[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT-1] );
00368     // "D_FacSchPerf" Faculty scholarship performance
00369     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, faculty_array.performance_scholarship[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT-1] );
00370     // "D_FacResPerf" Faculty research performance
00371     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, faculty_array.performance_research[HISTORY_TRIMESTER_COUNT-1] );
00372     // "D_FacMorale" Faculty morale
00373     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, p_faculty_morale );
00374     // "D_SponsRes%" Pct faculty with spons. research
00375     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, regular_faculty_with_research[HISTORY_MONTH_COUNT-1] );
00376 
00377                                                   // "D_Class_Dev%" Class size deviation from norm
00378     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, course_array.size_deviation[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD] );
00379     float percentFailure = 0.0f;
00380     float courseDenial = 0.0f;
00381     if( course_array.convention_student_count[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD] > 0 ) {
00382         percentFailure = (float)course_array.failure_count[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD] / (float)course_array.convention_student_count[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD] * 100.0f;
00383         courseDenial = (float)course_array.admission_denied_count[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD] / (float)course_array.convention_student_count[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD] * 100.0f;
00384     }
00385     // "D_CseDenials" Students denied entrance to cses
00386     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, courseDenial );
00387     // "D_Failures%" Percent failures
00388     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, percentFailure );
00389     // "D_IT_course%" Percent of courses opt. for IT
00390     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_PERCENT_FIELD(filePtr, p_tech_utilization );
00391     // "D_Outsource_Cr" Outsourced credits
00392     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, course_array.outsourcing_credits[MAX_TEACHING_METHOD] );
00393     // WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, distance_learning_credits ); // "D_DL_Credits" Distance learning credits
00394     // "D_DL_Credits" Distance learning credits
00395     WRITE_FIELD_SEPARATOR(filePtr); WRITE_NUM_FIELD(filePtr, distance_credits_provided );
00396 
00397     return 1;
00398 }
